TopicTitle: Is it a bug or a feature?

Articles.Content: Hello! i have noticed that when i RCS maneuver i lose Δv on my main engine. Even though i have a full Monopropellant tank. Is it a bug? or a feature? If its a feature.. is it better to just not bring monopropellant if you use your CH4 and oxidiser?

First, bugs are merely features that the developer didn't intend to code. 

Seriously, it's a bug where dV is being calculated based on all available propellant, which include monopropellant.

Touché!

so i should wait with putting on my monopropellant until right before launch.

 

Thx!
